## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-108">Numero di routing ABA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-109">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-110">nove cifre che possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-111">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-112">due cifre negli intervalli 00-12, 21-32, 61-72 o 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-113">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-114">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-115">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-116">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-117">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-118">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-119">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-120">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-121">Un criterio ha una probabilità media di rilevamento di questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-122">La funzione Func_aba_routing restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-123">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ABA_Routing.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-124">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-125">La funzione Func_aba_routing restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-143">Numero DNI (Argentina National Identity)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-144">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-145">Otto cifre con o senza punti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-146">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-147">Otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-148">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-149">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-150">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-151">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-152">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-153">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-154">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-155">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-156">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-157">L'espressione regolare Regex_argentina_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-158">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_argentina_national_id dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-170">Codice identificativo fiscale univoco argentina (CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-171">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-172">11 cifre con trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-172">11 digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-173">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-174">11 cifre con un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-174">11 digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-175">due cifre in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 o 34</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-176">un trattino (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-177">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-178">un trattino (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-179">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-180">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-181">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-182">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-183">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-184">La funzione `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-185">Viene trovata una parola `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-186">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-187">La funzione `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-226">Numero di conto corrente bancario Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-227">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-228">da sei a 10 cifre con o senza un numero di filiale dello stato della banca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-228">six to 10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-229">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-230">Il numero di account è da 6 a 10 cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-231">Numero BSB australiano:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-232">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-233">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-233">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-234">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-235">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-236">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-237">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-238">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-239">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-240">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-241">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-242">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-243">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_bank_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-244">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-328">Numero di patente australiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-329">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-330">nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-331">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-332">nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-333">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-334">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-335">cinque cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-336">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-337">da una a due lettere facoltative (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-338">da quattro a nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-339">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-340">nove cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-341">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-342">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-343">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-344">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-345">L'espressione regolare Regex_australia_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-346">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-347">Non vengono trovate parole chiava da Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-447">Numero di conto medico Australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-448">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-449">10-11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-450">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-451">10-11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-452">La prima cifra è compresa nell'intervallo 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-453">La nona cifra è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-453">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-454">La decima cifra è la cifra del problema</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-455">L'undicesima cifra (facoltativa) è il numero singolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-456">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-457">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-458">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-459">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-460">La funzione Func_australian_medical_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-461">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-462">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-474">Numero di passaporto australiano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-475">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-476">otto o nove caratteri alfanumerici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span> 

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-477">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-478">una lettera (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) seguita da sette cifre o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by seven digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-479">Due lettere (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) seguite da sette cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-479">Two letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by seven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-480">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-481">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-482">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-483">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-484">L'espressione `Regex_australia_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-485">Viene trovata una parola `Keyword_australia_passport_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-486">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-487">L'espressione `Regex_australia_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>  
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-507">Numero di file fiscale australia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-508">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-509">da otto a nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-510">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-511">da otto a nove cifre in genere presentate con spazi come segue:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-512">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-512">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-513">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-513">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-514">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-514">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-515">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-515">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-516">da due a tre cifre in cui l'ultima cifra è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-517">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-518">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-519">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-520">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-521">La funzione Func_australian_tax_file_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-522">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number o da Keyword_number_exclusions.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-523">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-535">Austria - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-536">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-537">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-538">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-539">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-539">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-540">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-541">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-542">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-543">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-544">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-545">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-672">Carta d'identità Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-673">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-674">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-675">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-676">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-677">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-678">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-679">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-680">Una combinazione di 24 caratteri di lettere, cifre e caratteri speciali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-681">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-682">24 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-682">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-683">22 lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), cifre, barre rovesciate, barre o segni più</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-684">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), cifre, barre rovesciate, barre, segni più o segni di uguale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-685">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-686">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-686">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-687">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-688">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-689">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-690">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-691">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-691">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-696">Numero di passaporto austriano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-697">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-698">Una lettera seguita da uno spazio facoltativo e sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-699">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-700">Combinazione di una lettera, sette cifre e uno spazio:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-701">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-702">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-703">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-703">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-704">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-705">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-705">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-706">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-707">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-708">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-709">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-710">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-711">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-712">L'espressione  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-713">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-737">Austria - Numero di previdenza sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-738">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-739">10 cifre nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-740">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-741">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-741">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-742">tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero di serie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-743">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-744">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-745">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-746">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-747">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-748">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-749">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-750">viene trovata una  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` parola chiave da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-751">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-752">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-778">Numero di identificazione fiscale Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-779">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-780">nove cifre con trattino facoltativo e barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-781">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-782">nove cifre con trattino facoltativo e barra:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-783">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-784">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-785">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-786">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-787">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-787">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-788">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-789">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-789">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-790">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-791">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-792">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-793">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-794">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-795">La funzione  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-818">Imposta sul valore aggiunto dell'Austria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-819">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-820">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-821">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-822">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-823">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-824">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-825">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-826">Motivo alfanumerico a 11 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-827">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-828">Motivo alfanumerico di 11 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-829">A o a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-830">T o t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-831">Spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-832">U o u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-833">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-834">due o tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-835">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-836">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-837">spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-838">una o due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-839">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-840">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-841">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-842">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-843">La funzione Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-844">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-845">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-846">La funzione Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-864">Chiave di autenticazione di Azure DocumentDB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-865">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-866">La stringa "DocumentDb" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-867">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-868">Stringa "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-869">Qualsiasi combinazione di 3-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-870">Un simbolo di maggiore di (>), un segno di uguale (=), una virgoletta (") o un apostrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-871">Qualsiasi combinazione di 86 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-872">Due segni di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-873">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-874">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-875">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-876">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-877">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-878">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-893">Stringa di connessione del database IAAS di Azure e stringa di connessione SQL azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-893">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-894">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-894">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-895">Stringa "Server", "server" o "origine dati" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente, inclusa la stringa "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-895">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-896">com" o "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-896">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-897">net" o "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-897">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-898">net" e la stringa "Password" o "password" o "pwd".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-898">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-899">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-899">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-900">la stringa "Server", "server" o "origine dati"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-900">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-901">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-902">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-903">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-904">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-904">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-905">Stringa "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-905">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-907">net" o "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-907">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-908">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-908">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-909">qualsiasi combinazione tra 1 e 300 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-909">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-910">la stringa "Password", "password" o "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-910">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-911">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-912">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-913">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-914">uno o più caratteri che non sono un punto e virgola (;), virgolette (") o apostrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-914">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-915">un punto e virgola (;), virgolette (") o apostrofo (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-915">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-916">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-917">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-918">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-919">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-919">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-920">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-920">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-921">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-921">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-942">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-942">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-943">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-943">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-944">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-944">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-948">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-948">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-949">la stringa "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-949">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-950">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-950">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-951">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-951">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-952">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-952">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-953">qualsiasi combinazione di 43 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-953">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-954">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-954">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-956">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-956">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-957">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-958">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-958">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-959">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-959">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-960">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-960">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
