## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1036">Firma di accesso condiviso di Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1036">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1037">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1038">La stringa "sig" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe delineati nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1038">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1039">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1039">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1040">la stringa "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1040">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1041">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1041">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1042">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1042">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1043">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1043">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1044">qualsiasi combinazione di caratteri compresi tra 43 e 53 caratteri che siano lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre o il segno di percentuale (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1044">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1045">stringa "%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1045">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1046">qualsiasi carattere che non sia una lettera minuscola o maiuscola, una cifra o un segno di percentuale (%)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1046">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1047">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1048">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1048">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1049">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1050">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1051">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureSAS trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1051">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1052">Stringa di connessione del bus di servizio di Azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1052">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1053">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1054">La stringa "EndPoint" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente, incluse le stringhe "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1054">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1055">net" e "SharedAccesKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1055">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1056">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1056">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1057">la stringa "EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1057">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1058">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1058">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1059">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1059">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1060">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1061">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1061">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1062">la stringa "servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1062">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1063">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1063">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1064">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1064">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1065">la stringa "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1065">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1066">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1066">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1067">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1067">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1068">da zero a due spazi vuoti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1068">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1069">qualsiasi combinazione di 43 caratteri minuscoli o maiuscoli, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1069">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1070">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1070">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1071">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1072">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1072">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1073">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1074">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1074">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1075">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1075">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1076">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1076">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1109">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1110">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1110">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1112">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1112">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
        </Any>

```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1130">Archiviazione di Azure account utente (generica)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1130">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1131">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1132">Qualsiasi combinazione di 86 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+), preceduta o seguita dai caratteri indicati nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1132">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1133">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1133">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1134">da zero a uno dei simboli di maggiore di (>), apostrofo ('), segno di uguale (=), virgolette (") o simbolo di numero (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1134">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1135">qualsiasi combinazione di 86 caratteri minuscoli o maiuscoli, cifre, barra (/) o segno più (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1135">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1136">due segni di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1136">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1137">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1138">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1139">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1140">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1140">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1141">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1141">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1142">Numero di patente di guida belgio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1142">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1143">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1144">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1144">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1145">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1146">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1146">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1147">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1148">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1148">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1149">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1150">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1150">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1151">L'espressione  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1151">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1152">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1152">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1285">Belgio - Numero nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1285">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1286">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1287">11 cifre più delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1287">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1288">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1289">11 cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1289">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1290">sei cifre e due punti facoltativi nel formato AA. MM.DD per la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1290">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1291">Delimitatore facoltativo da punto, trattino, spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1291">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1292">tre cifre sequenziali (dispari per i maschi, anche per le femmine)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1292">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1293">Delimitatore facoltativo da punto, trattino, spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1293">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1294">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1294">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1295">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1296">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1296">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1297">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1298">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1299">La funzione Func_belgium_national_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1299">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1300">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_belgium_national_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1300">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1301">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1301">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1302">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1302">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1303">La funzione Func_belgium_national_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1303">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1304">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1304">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1363">Belgio - numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1363">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1364">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1365">due lettere seguite da sei cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1365">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1366">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1367">due lettere e seguito da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1367">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1368">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1369">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1369">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1370">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1370">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1371">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1372">L'espressione  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1372">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1373">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1373">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1374">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date2` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AA o una parola chiave da o viene `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1374">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1375">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1375">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1376">L'espressione  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1376">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1377">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1377">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1404">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto del Belgio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1404">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1405">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1405">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1406">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1406">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1407">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1407">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1408">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1408">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1409">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1409">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1410">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1411">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1412">Motivo alfanumerico a 12 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1412">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1413">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1414">Motivo alfanumerico a 12 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1414">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1415">una lettera B o b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1415">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1416">una lettera E o e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1416">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1417">una cifra 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1417">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1418">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1418">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1419">un punto facoltativo o un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1419">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1420">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1420">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1421">un punto facoltativo o un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1421">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1422">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1422">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1423">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1424">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1424">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1425">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1426">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1427">La funzione Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1427">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1428">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1428">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1429">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1430">La funzione Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1430">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1442">Brasile - Numero CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1442">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1443">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1444">11 cifre che includono una cifra di controllo e possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1444">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1445">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1446">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1446">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1447">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1447">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1448">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1448">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1449">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1449">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1450">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1450">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1451">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1451">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1452">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1452">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1453">due cifre che sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1453">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1454">Non formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1454">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1455">11 cifre dove le ultime due sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1455">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1456">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1457">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1458">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1459">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1460">La funzione Func_brazil_cpf trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1460">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1461">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_brazil_cpf.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1461">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1462">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1462">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1463">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1464">La funzione Func_brazil_cpf trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1464">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1465">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1477">Numero della persona giuridica del Brasile (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1477">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1478">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1479">14 cifre che includono il numero di registrazione, il codice della filiale, le cifre di controllo e i delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1479">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1480">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1481">14 cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1481">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1482">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1482">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1483">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1483">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1484">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1484">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1485">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1485">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1486">tre cifre (queste prime otto cifre sono il numero di registrazione)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1486">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1487">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1487">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1488">Numero di ramo a quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1488">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1489">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1489">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1490">due cifre che sono cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1490">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1491">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1492">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1492">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1493">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1494">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1494">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1495">La funzione Func_brazil_cnpj trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1495">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1496">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_brazil_cnpj da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1496">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1497">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1497">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1498">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1498">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1499">La funzione Func_brazil_cnpj trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1499">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1500">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1522">Carta di identità nazionale (RG) del Brasile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1522">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1523">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1524">Registro Geral (formato precedente): nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1524">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nuovo formato): 11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1526">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1527">Registro Geral (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1527">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1528">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1528">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1529">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1529">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1530">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1530">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1531">un punto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1531">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1532">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1532">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1533">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1533">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1534">una cifra che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1534">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1536">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1536">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1537">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1537">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1538">una cifra che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1538">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1539">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1540">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1540">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1541">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1542">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1542">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1543">La funzione Func_brazil_rg trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1543">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1544">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_brazil_rg.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1544">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1545">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1545">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1556">Numero di patente di guida bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1556">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1557">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1558">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1558">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1559">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1560">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1560">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1561">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1562">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1563">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1564">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1565">L'espressione  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1565">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1566">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1693">Numero civile uniforme Bulgaria</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1693">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1694">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1694">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1695">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1695">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1696">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1696">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1697">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1697">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1698">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1698">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1699">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1699">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1700">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1701">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1701">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1702">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1703">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1703">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1704">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1704">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1705">due cifre che corrispondono all'ordine di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1705">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1706">una cifra che corrisponde al sesso: una cifra pari per il maschio e una cifra dispari per la donna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1706">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1707">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1707">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1708">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1709">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1709">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1710">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1711">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1712">La funzione  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1712">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1713">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1713">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1714">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1714">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1715">La funzione  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1715">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1760">Numero di passaporto bulgaro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1760">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1761">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1762">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1762">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1763">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1764">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1764">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1765">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1766">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1767">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1768">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1769">L'espressione  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1769">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1770">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1771">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1771">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1772">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1773">L'espressione  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1773">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1774">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1774">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1794">Canada - Numero di conto corrente bancario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1794">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1795">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1796">7 o 12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1796">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1797">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1798">Un numero di conto corrente bancario canadese è di 7 o 12 cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1798">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1799">Un numero di transito bancario canadese comprende:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1799">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1800">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1800">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1801">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1801">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1802">tre cifre OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1802">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1803">zero "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1803">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1804">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1804">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1805">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1806">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1807">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1808">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1808">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1809">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1809">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1810">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1811">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1811">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1812">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1813">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1813">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1814">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1814">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1838">Canada - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1838">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1839">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1840">Varia in base alla provincia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1840">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1841">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1842">Vari modelli che coprono:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1842">Various patterns covering:</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1855">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1855">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1856">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1859">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1859">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1995">Numero del servizio sanitario canadese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1995">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1996">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1996">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1997">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1997">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1998">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1998">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-1999">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-1999">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2000">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2000">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2001">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2001">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2002">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2002">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2003">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2003">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2004">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_health_service_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2004">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2005">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_canada_health_service_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2005">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2017">Numero di passaporto canadese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2017">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2018">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2018">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2019">due lettere maiuscole seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2019">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2020">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2020">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2021">due lettere maiuscole seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2021">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2022">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2023">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2023">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2024">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2025">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2026">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_passport_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2026">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2027">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_canada_passport_number o Keyword_passport viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2027">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2057">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2057">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2058">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2059">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2059">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2060">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2061">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2061">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2062">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2063">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2064">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2065">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2065">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2066">L'espressione regolare Regex_canada_phin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2066">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2067">Vengono trovate almeno due parole Keyword_canada_phin o Keyword_canada_provinces.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2067">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2100">Canada - Numero di previdenza sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2100">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2101">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2102">nove cifre con trattini o spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2102">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2103">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2104">Formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2104">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2105">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2105">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2106">un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2106">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2107">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2107">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2108">un trattino o uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2108">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2109">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2109">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2110">Non formattato: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2110">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2111">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2112">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2112">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2113">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2114">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2114">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2115">La funzione Func_canadian_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2115">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2116">Almeno due dei modelli seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2116">At least two of the following patterns:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2117">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2117">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2118">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin_collaborative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2118">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2119">La funzione Func_eu_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2119">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2120">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2120">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2121">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2121">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2122">La funzione Func_unformatted_canadian_sin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2122">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2123">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_sin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2123">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2124">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2124">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
