## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2149">Numero di carta di identità cileno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2149">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2150">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2151">da sette a otto cifre più delimitatori una cifra di controllo o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2151">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2152">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2153">da sette a otto cifre più delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2153">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2154">da una a due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2154">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2155">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2155">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2156">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2156">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2157">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2157">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2158">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2158">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2159">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2159">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2160">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2160">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2161">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2162">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2162">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2163">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2164">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2164">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2165">La funzione Func_chile_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2165">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2166">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_chile_id_card parola chiave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2166">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2167">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2168">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2169">La funzione Func_chile_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2169">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2170">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2170">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2207">Numero di carta d'identità (PRC) residente in Cina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2207">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2208">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2209">18 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2209">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2210">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2211">18 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2211">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2212">sei cifre che sono un codice indirizzo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2212">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2213">otto cifre nel formato AAAAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2213">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2214">tre cifre che sono un codice d'ordine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2214">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2215">una cifra che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2215">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2216">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2217">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2217">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2218">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2219">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2219">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2220">La funzione Func_china_resident_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2220">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2221">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_china_resident_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2221">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2222">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2223">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2223">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2224">La funzione Func_china_resident_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2224">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2225">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2238">Numero di carta di credito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2238">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2239">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2240">Da 14 a 16 cifre che possono essere formattate o non formattate (dddddddd) e che devono superare il test Luhn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2240">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2241">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2242">Rileva le carte di tutte le principali marche in tutto il mondo, tra cui Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, carte regalo e carte da pranzo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2242">Detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2243">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2244">Yes, il checksum Luhn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2244">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2245">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2246">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2246">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2247">La funzione Func_credit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2247">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2248">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2248">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2249">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_cc_verification.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2249">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2250">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_cc_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2250">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2251">La funzione Func_expiration_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2251">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2252">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2253">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2253">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2254">La funzione Func_credit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2254">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2255">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2515">Croatia driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2515">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2516">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2517">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2517">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2518">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2519">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2519">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2520">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2521">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2521">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2522">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2523">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2523">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2524">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2524">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2525">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2525">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2649">Numero di carta d'identità della Croazia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2649">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2650">Questa entità è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate NUMERO DI IDENTIFICAZIONE NAZIONALE UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2650">This entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2651">È disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2651">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2652">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2653">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2653">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2654">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2655">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2655">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2656">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2657">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2657">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2658">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2659">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2659">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2660">La funzione Func_croatia_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2660">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2661">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_croatia_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2661">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2692">Numero di passaporto croato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2692">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2693">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2694">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2694">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2695">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2696">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2696">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2697">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2698">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2698">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2699">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2700">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2700">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2701">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2701">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2702">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2703">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2703">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2704">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2705">L'espressione  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2705">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2706">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2724">Numero di identificazione personale (OIB) della Croazia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2724">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2725">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2726">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2726">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2727">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2728">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2728">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2729">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2729">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2730">la cifra finale è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2730">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2731">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2732">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2732">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2733">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2734">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2735">La funzione Func_croatia_oib_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2735">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2736">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2736">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2737">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2738">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2738">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2739">La funzione Func_croatia_oib_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2739">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2740">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2740">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2771">Numero di licenza per i driver di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2771">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2772">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2773">12 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2773">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2774">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2775">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2775">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2776">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2777">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2777">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2778">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2779">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2779">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2780">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2780">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2781">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2781">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2906">Carta d'identità di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2906">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2907">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2907">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2908">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2908">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2909">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2909">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2910">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2910">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2911">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2911">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2912">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2912">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2913">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2914">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2914">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2915">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2916">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2916">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2917">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2918">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2918">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2919">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2920">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2921">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2921">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2922">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2922">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2931">Numero di passaporto di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2931">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2932">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2933">una lettera seguita da 6-8 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2933">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2934">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2935">una lettera seguita da sei a otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2935">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2936">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2937">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2937">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2938">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2939">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2939">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2940">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2940">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2941">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2941">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2942">L'espressione `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` regolare trova la data nel formato GG/MM/AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2942">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2943">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2943">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2944">L'espressione  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2944">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2945">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2945">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2974">Codice fiscale di Cipro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2974">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2975">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2975">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2976">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2976">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2977">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2977">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2978">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2978">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2979">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2979">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2980">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2980">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2981">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2982">otto cifre e una lettera nello schema specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2982">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2983">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2984">otto cifre e una lettera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2984">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2985">a "0" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2985">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2986">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2986">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2987">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2987">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2988">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2989">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2989">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2990">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2991">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2991">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2992">La funzione  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2992">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2993">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2993">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2994">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2994">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-2995">La funzione  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-2995">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3023">Numero di patente di guida ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3023">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3024">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3025">due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3025">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3026">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3027">otto lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3027">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3028">lettera "E" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3028">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3029">Una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3029">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3030">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3030">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3031">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3032">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3033">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3033">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3034">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3035">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3035">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3036">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3036">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3037">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3037">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3163">Numero di passaporto ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3163">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3164">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3165">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3165">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3166">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3167">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3167">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3168">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3169">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3169">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3170">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3171">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3171">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3172">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3172">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3173">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3173">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3174">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3174">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3175">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3176">L'espressione  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3176">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3177">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3199">Numero di identità personale ceco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3199">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3200">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3201">nove cifre con barra facoltativa (formato precedente) 10 cifre con barra facoltativa (nuovo formato)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3201">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3202">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3203">nove cifre (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3203">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3204">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3204">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3205">una barra facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3205">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3206">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3206">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3207">10 cifre (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3207">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3208">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3208">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3209">una barra facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3209">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3210">quattro cifre in cui l'ultima cifra è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3210">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3211">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3212">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3213">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3214">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3214">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3215">La funzione Func_czech_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3215">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3216">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_czech_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3216">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3217">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3218">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3218">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3219">La funzione Func_czech_id_card_new_format trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3219">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3220">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3267">Numero di patente di guida danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3267">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3268">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3269">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3269">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3270">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3271">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3271">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3272">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3273">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3273">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3274">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3275">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3275">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3276">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3276">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3277">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3277">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3401">Numero di passaporto danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3401">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3402">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3403">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3403">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3404">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3405">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3405">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3406">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3407">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3407">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3408">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3409">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3409">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3410">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3410">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3411">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3411">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3412">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date2` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AA o una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3412">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3413">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3413">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3414">L'espressione  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3414">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3415">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3415">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3435">Numero di identificazione personale Danimarca</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3435">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3436">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3436">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3437">10 cifre contenenti una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3437">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3438">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3439">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3439">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3440">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3440">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3441">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3441">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3442">quattro cifre in cui la cifra finale è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3442">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3443">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3444">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3445">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3446">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3446">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3447">L'espressione regolare Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3447">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3448">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_denmark_id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3448">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3449">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3449">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3450">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3450">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3451">L'espressione regolare Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3451">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3452">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3452">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3524">Numero dea (Drug Enforcement Agency)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3524">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3525">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3526">due lettere seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3526">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3527">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3528">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3528">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3529">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) da questo set di lettere possibili: abcdefghjklmnprstux, che è un codice registrante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3529">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3530">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole), ovvero la prima lettera del cognome o della cifra "9" del dichiarante</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3530">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3531">sette cifre, l'ultima delle quali è la cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3531">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3532">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3533">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3533">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3534">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3535">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3535">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3536">La funzione Func_dea_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3536">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3537">Viene trovata una parola `Keyword_dea_number` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3537">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3538">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3538">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3539">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3540">La funzione Func_dea_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3540">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3541">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3541">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3548">Numero di patente di guida estonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3548">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3549">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3550">due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3550">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3551">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3552">due lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3552">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3553">le lettere "ET" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3553">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3554">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3554">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3555">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3556">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3556">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3557">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3558">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3558">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3559">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3559">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3560">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3560">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
