- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3688">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3688">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3689">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3689">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3690">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3690">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3691">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3691">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3692">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3692">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3693">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3694">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3694">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3695">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3696">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3696">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3697">una cifra che corrisponde al sesso e al secolo di nascita (numero dispari maschile, numero pari femminile; 1-2: 19° secolo; 3-4: 20° secolo; 5-6: 21° secolo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3697">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3698">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3698">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3699">tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero seriale che separa le persone nate nella stessa data</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3699">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3700">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3700">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3701">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3702">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3702">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3703">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3704">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3704">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3705">La funzione  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3705">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3706">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3706">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3707">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3707">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3708">La funzione  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3708">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3741">Numero di passaporto estone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3741">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3742">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3742">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3743">una lettera seguita da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3743">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3744">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3744">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3745">una lettera seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3745">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3746">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3747">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3747">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3748">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3749">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3749">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3750">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3750">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3751">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3751">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3752">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3752">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3753">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3753">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3754">L'espressione  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3754">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3755">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3755">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3773">Numero di carta di debito dell'Unione europea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3773">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3774">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3775">16 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3775">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3776">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3777">Modello complesso e affidabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3777">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3778">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3779">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3779">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3780">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3781">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3781">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3782">La funzione Func_eu_debit_card restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3782">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3783">Si verifica almeno una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3783">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3784">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_eu_debit_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3784">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3785">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3785">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3786">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_security_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3786">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3787">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3787">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3788">La funzione Func_expiration_date rileva una data nel formato corretto.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3788">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-3789">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-3789">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4236">Numero di patente di guida finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4236">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4237">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4238">10 cifre contenenti una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4238">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4239">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4240">10 cifre contenenti un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4240">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4241">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4241">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4242">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4242">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4243">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4243">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4244">una cifra o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4244">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4245">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4246">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4246">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4247">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4248">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4248">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4249">L'espressione  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4249">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4250">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4250">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4381">Finlandia - Numero di assicurazione sanitaria europea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4381">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4382">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4382">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4383">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4383">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4384">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4384">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4385">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4385">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4386">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4386">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4387">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4387">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4388">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4389">Numero a 20 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4389">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4390">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4391">Numero a 20 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4391">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4392">10 cifre - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4392">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4393">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4393">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4394">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4394">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4395">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4396">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4396">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4397">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4398">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4399">L'espressione Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4399">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4400">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4400">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4418">Id nazionale Finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4418">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4419">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4419">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4420">sei cifre più un carattere che indica un secolo più tre cifre più una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4420">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4421">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4421">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4422">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4422">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4423">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, che sono una data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4423">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4424">indicatore del secolo ('-', '+' o 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4424">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4425">Numero di identificazione personale a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4425">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4426">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) che è una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4426">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4427">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4427">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4428">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4428">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4429">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4429">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4430">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4430">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4431">la funzione Func_finnish_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4431">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4432">viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_finnish_national_id viene trovata</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4432">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4433">il checksum passa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4433">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4434">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4434">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4435">la funzione Func_finnish_national_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4435">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4436">il checksum passa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4436">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4485">Numero di passaporto finlandia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4485">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4486">Questa entità è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di passaporto UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4486">This entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4487">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4487">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4488">combinazione di nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4488">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4489">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4489">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4490">combinazione di nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4490">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4491">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4491">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4492">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4492">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4493">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4494">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4494">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4495">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4496">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4496">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4497">L'espressione `Regex_finland_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4497">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4498">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_finland_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4498">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4499">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4499">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4500">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4501">L'espressione `Regex_finland_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4501">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4502">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_finland_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4502">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4526">Francia - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4526">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4527">Questa entità è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di patente dell'UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4527">This entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4528">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4528">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4529">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4529">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4530">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4530">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4531">12 cifre con convalida per scontare modelli analoghi, ad esempio, quello dei numeri telefonici francesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4531">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4532">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4533">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4533">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4534">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4535">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4535">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4536">la funzione Func_french_drivers_license trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4536">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4537">viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_french_drivers_license ricerca.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4537">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4664">Numero dell'assicurazione sanitaria francese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4664">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4665">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4665">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4666">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4666">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4667">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4667">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4668">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4668">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4669">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4669">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4670">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4670">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4671">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4671">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4672">Numero a 21 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4672">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4673">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4673">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4674">Numero a 21 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4674">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4675">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4675">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4676">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4676">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4677">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4677">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4678">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4678">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4679">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4679">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4680">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4681">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4681">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4682">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4683">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4683">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4684">l'espressione Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4684">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4685">viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4685">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4686">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4686">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4687">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4687">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4688">carta assicurativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4688">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4689">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4689">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4690">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4690">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4691">Carta d'identità francese (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4691">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4692">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4693">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4693">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4694">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4695">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4695">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4696">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4697">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4697">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4698">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4699">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4699">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4700">L'espressione regolare Regex_france_cni restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4700">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4701">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card dall'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4701">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4715">Francia - numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4715">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4716">Questa entità è disponibile nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di passaporto UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4716">This entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4717">È disponibile anche come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4717">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4718">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4719">nove cifre e lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4719">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4720">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4721">nove cifre e lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4721">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4722">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4722">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4723">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4723">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4724">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4724">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4725">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4726">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4726">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4727">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4728">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4729">La funzione `Func_fr_passport` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4729">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4730">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4730">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4731">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4731">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4732">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4732">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4733">La funzione `Func_fr_passport` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4733">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4734">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4734">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4765">Numero di previdenza sociale francia (INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4765">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4766">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4767">15 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4767">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4768">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4769">Deve corrispondere a uno di questi due modelli:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4769">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4770">13 cifre seguite da uno spazio seguito da due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4770">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4771">oppure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4771">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4772">15 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4772">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4773">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4774">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4774">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4775">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4776">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4776">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4777">La funzione `Func_french_insee` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4777">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4778">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_fr_insee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4778">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4779">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4780">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4780">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4781">La funzione Func_french_insee o Func_fr_insee trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4781">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4782">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4782">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

no. d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-p134">no. d'identite</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4813">Numero di identificazione fiscale francia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4813">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4814">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4815">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4815">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4816">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4817">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4817">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4818">Una cifra che deve essere 0, 1, 2 o 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4818">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4819">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4819">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4820">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4820">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4821">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4821">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4822">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4822">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4823">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4823">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4824">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4824">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4825">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4825">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4826">Uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4826">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4827">Tre cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4827">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4828">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4829">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4829">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4830">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4831">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4831">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4832">La funzione  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4832">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4833">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4833">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4834">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4834">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4835">La funzione  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4835">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4855">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto della Francia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4855">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4856">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4856">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4857">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4857">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4858">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4858">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4860">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4860">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4861">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4861">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4862">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4863">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4863">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4864">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4865">Motivo alfanumerico a 13 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4865">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4866">due lettere - FR (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4866">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4867">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4867">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4868">due lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4868">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4869">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto, un trattino o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4869">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4870">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4870">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4871">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto, un trattino o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4871">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4872">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4872">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4873">uno spazio facoltativo, un punto, un trattino o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4873">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4874">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4874">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4875">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4875">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4876">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4876">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4877">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4877">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4878">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4878">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4879">La funzione Func_france_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4879">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4880">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4880">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4881">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4881">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4882">La funzione Func_france_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4882">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4895">Germania - Numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4895">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4896">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di patente dell'UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4896">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4897">È disponibile anche come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4897">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4898">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4898">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4899">combinazione di 11 cifre e lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4899">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4900">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4900">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4901">11 cifre e lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4901">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4902">una cifra o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4902">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4903">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4903">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4904">sei cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4904">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4905">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4905">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4906">una cifra o una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4906">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4907">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4908">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4908">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4909">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4910">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4911">La funzione Func_german_drivers_license restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4911">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4912">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_german_drivers_license_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4912">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-4913">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-4913">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5062">Numero carta d'identità Germania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5062">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5063">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5064">dal 1° novembre 2010: nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5064">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5065">dal 1° aprile 1987 al 31 ottobre 2010: 10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5065">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5066">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5067">dal 1° novembre 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5067">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5068">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5068">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5069">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5069">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5070">dal 1° aprile 1987 al 31 ottobre 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5070">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5071">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5071">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5072">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5073">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5073">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5074">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5075">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5075">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5076">L'espressione regolare Regex_germany_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5076">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5077">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_germany_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5077">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5093">Germania - Numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5093">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5094">Questa entità è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate NUMERO PASSAPORTO UE ed è disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonoma.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5094">This entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5095">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5096">10 cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5096">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5097">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5097">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5098">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5098">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5099">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5099">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5100">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5100">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5101">cinque cifre o lettere di questo set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5101">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5102">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5102">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5103">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5104">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5104">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5105">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5106">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5106">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5107">La funzione Func_german_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5107">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5108">Viene trovata una `Keyword_german_passport` parola chiave da o `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5108">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5109">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5109">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5110">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5110">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5111">La funzione Func_german_passport_data restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5111">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5112">Viene trovata una `Keyword_german_passport` parola chiave da o `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5112">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5113">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5113">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
