## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5136">Numero di identificazione fiscale Germania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5136">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5137">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5138">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5138">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5139">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5140">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5140">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5141">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5141">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5142">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5142">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5143">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5143">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5144">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5144">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5145">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5145">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5146">Uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5146">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5147">Due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5147">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5148">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5148">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5149">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5150">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5150">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5151">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5152">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5152">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5153">La funzione  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5153">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5154">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5154">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5155">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5155">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5156">La funzione  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5156">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5157">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5157">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5158">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5158">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5159">identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5159">identifikationsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5182">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto della Germania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5182">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5183">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5183">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5184">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5184">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5185">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5185">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5186">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5186">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5187">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5187">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5188">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5188">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5189">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5189">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5190">Motivo alfanumerico a 11 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5190">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5191">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5191">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5192">Motivo alfanumerico di 11 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5192">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5193">una lettera D o d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5193">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5194">una lettera E o e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5194">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5195">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5195">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5196">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5196">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5197">uno spazio facoltativo o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5197">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5198">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5198">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5199">uno spazio facoltativo o una virgola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5199">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5200">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5200">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5201">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5202">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5203">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5204">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5205">La funzione Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5205">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5206">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5206">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5207">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5208">La funzione Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5208">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5211">partita IVA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5211">vat number</span></span>

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5218">Numero di patente di guida in Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5218">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5219">Questa entità è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate numero di patente ue.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5219">This entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5220">È inoltre disponibile come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5220">It is also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5221">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5222">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5222">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5223">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5224">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5224">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5225">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5225">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5226">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5226">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5227">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5227">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5228">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5228">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5229">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5229">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5230">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5230">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5356">Carta d'identità nazionale della Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5356">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5357">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5358">Combinazione di 7-8 lettere e numeri, oltre a un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5358">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5359">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5360">Sette lettere e numeri (formato precedente):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5360">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5361">Una lettera (qualsiasi lettera dell'alfabeto greco) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5361">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5362">Un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5362">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5363">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5363">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5364">Otto lettere e numeri (nuovo formato):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5364">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5365">Due lettere in maiuscolo sia in alfabeto latino che greco (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5365">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5366">Un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5366">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5367">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5367">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5368">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5369">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5369">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5370">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5370">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5371">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5372">L'espressione regolare Regex_greece_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5372">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5373">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_greece_id_card'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5373">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5374">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5374">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5375">L'espressione regolare Regex_greece_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5375">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5376">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5376">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5377">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5377">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5378">greek id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5378">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5379">greek national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5379">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5380">carta d'identità greco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5380">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5381">id polizia greco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5381">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5382">carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5382">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5383">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5383">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5384">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5384">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5385">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5385">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5386">Numero di passaporto della Grecia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5386">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5387">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5388">Due lettere seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5388">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5389">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5390">Due lettere seguite da 7 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5390">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5391">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5392">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5392">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5393">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5394">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5395">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5395">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5396">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5397">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM AA (esempio - 28 agosto 19) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5397">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5398">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5399">L'espressione  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5399">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5400">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5417">Grecia - Numero di previdenza sociale (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5417">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5418">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5418">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5419">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5419">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5420">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5420">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5421">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5421">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5422">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5422">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5423">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5423">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5424">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5425">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5425">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5426">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5426">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5427">Sei cifre come data di nascita AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5427">Six digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5428">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5428">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5429">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5429">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5430">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5430">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5431">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5431">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5432">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5432">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5433">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5433">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5434">La funzione  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5434">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5435">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5435">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5436">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5437">La funzione  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5437">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

```xml
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5493">Numero della carta di identità (HKID) di Hong Kong</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5493">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5494">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5495">Combinazione di 8-9 lettere e numeri. Facoltativamente, l’ultimo carattere può essere racchiuso tra parentesi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5495">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5496">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5497">Combinazione di 8-9 lettere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5497">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5498">1-2 lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5498">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5499">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5499">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5500">L'ultimo carattere (qualsiasi cifra o la lettera A), è rappresentato dal numero di controllo. Facoltativamente, può essere racchiuso tra parentesi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5500">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5501">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5502">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5502">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5503">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5504">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5504">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5505">La funzione Func_hong_kong_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5505">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5506">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_hong_kong_id_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5506">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5507">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5507">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5508">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5508">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5509">La funzione Func_hong_kong_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5509">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5510">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5510">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5550">Numero di patente di guida ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5550">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5551">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5552">Due lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5552">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5553">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5554">Due lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5554">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5555">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5555">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5556">Sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5556">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5557">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5558">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5558">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5559">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5560">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5560">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5561">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5561">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5562">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5562">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5687">Numero di identificazione personale ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5687">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5688">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5688">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5689">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5689">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5690">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5690">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5691">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5691">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5692">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5692">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5693">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5693">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5694">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5695">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5695">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5696">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5697">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5697">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5698">Una cifra che corrisponde al sesso, 1 per il maschio, 2 per la donna.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5698">One digit that corresponds to gender, 1 for male, 2 for female.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5699">Altri numeri sono possibili anche per i cittadini nati prima del 1900 o per i cittadini con doppia cittadinanza.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5699">Other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5700">Sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5700">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5701">Tre cifre che corrispondono a un numero seriale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5701">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5702">Una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5702">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5703">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5704">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5705">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5706">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5707">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5707">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5708">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5708">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5709">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5710">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5710">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5713">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5713">id number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5716">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5716">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5717">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5717">ig.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5720">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5720">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5721">Numero di passaporto ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5721">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5722">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5723">Due lettere seguite da sei o sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5723">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5724">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5725">Due lettere seguite da sei o sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5725">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5726">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5727">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5728">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5729">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5730">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5730">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5731">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5732">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (esempio - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5732">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5733">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5734">L'espressione  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5734">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5735">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5736">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5736">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5737">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5737">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5755">Codice di previdenza sociale ungherese (TAJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5755">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5756">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5757">Nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5757">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5758">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5759">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5759">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5760">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5761">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5761">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5762">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5763">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5764">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5764">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5765">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5765">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5766">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5767">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5787">Numero di identificazione fiscale ungherese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5787">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5788">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5788">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5789">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5789">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5790">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5790">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5791">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5791">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5792">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5792">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5793">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5793">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5794">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5795">10 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5795">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5796">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5797">10 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5797">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5798">Una cifra che deve essere "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5798">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5799">Otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5799">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5800">Una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5800">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5801">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5802">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5802">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5803">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5804">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5805">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5805">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5806">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5806">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5807">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5808">La funzione  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5836">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5838">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5838">information governance</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5841">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5841">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5843">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5844">Motivo alfanumerico a 10 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5844">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5848">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5849">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5849">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5850">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5851">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5851">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5852">La funzione Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5852">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5853">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5853">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5854">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5854">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5855">La funzione Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5869">India - Numero di account permanente (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5869">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5870">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5870">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5871">10 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5871">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5872">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5872">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5873">10 lettere o cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5873">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5874">Tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5874">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5875">Lettera in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5875">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5876">Una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5876">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5877">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5877">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5878">Una lettera che è una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5878">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5879">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5880">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5881">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5882">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5882">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5883">L'espressione regolare Regex_india_permanent_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5883">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5884">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_india_permanent_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5884">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5885">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5885">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5886">L'espressione regolare Regex_india_permanent_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5891">India - Numero di identificazione univoca (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5891">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5892">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5892">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5893">12 cifre contenenti spazi o trattini facoltativi </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5893">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5894">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5894">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5895">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5895">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5896">Una cifra che non è 0 o 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5896">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5897">Tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5897">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5898">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5898">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5899">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5899">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5900">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5900">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5901">La cifra finale, che è la cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5901">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5902">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5903">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5903">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5904">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5905">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5905">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5906">La funzione Func_india_aadhaar trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5906">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5907">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_india_aadhar da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5907">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5908">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5908">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5909">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5909">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5910">La funzione Func_india_aadhaar trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5910">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5911">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5916">aadhar #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5916">aadhar#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5918">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5918">आधार</span></span>

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5920">Numero della carta di identità indonesiana (KTP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5920">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5921">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5922">16 cifre contenenti punti facoltativi </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5922">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5923">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5924">16 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5924">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5925">Codice provincia a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5925">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5926">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5926">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5927">Codice città o area a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5927">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5928">Codice sotto-distretto a due cifre </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5928">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5929">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5929">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5930">Sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5930">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5931">Un punto (facoltativo) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5931">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5932">Quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5932">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5933">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5934">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5935">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5936">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5936">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5937">L'espressione regolare Regex_indonesia_id_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5937">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5938">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_indonesia_id_card da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5938">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5939">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5939">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5940">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5941">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5941">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5942">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5943">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5944">Numero di conto bancario internazionale (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5944">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5945">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5946">Codice paese (due lettere) più cifre di controllo (due cifre) più numero bban (fino a 30 caratteri)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5946">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5947">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5948">Il modello deve includere tutti gli elementi seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5948">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5949">Codice paese a due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5949">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5950">Due cifre di controllo (seguite da uno spazio facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5950">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5951">1-7 gruppi di quattro lettere o cifre (possono essere separati da spazi)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5951">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-5952">1-3 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-5952">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6017">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6018">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6018">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6019">La funzione Func_iban restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6019">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6020">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6020">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
