## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6951">Numero di patente lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6951">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6952">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6953">tre lettere seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6953">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6954">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6955">tre lettere e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6955">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6956">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6956">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6957">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6957">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6958">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6958">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6959">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6959">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6960">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6960">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6961">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6961">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6962">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6962">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-6963">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-6963">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7087">vadītāja apliecība</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7087">vadītāja apliecība</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7088">Codice personale Lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7088">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7089">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7089">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7090">11 cifre e un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7090">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7091">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7091">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7092">Formato precedente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7092">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7093">11 cifre e un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7093">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7094">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7094">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7095">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7095">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7096">una cifra che corrisponde al secolo di nascita ("0" per il 19° secolo, "1" per il 20° secolo e "2" per il 21° secolo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7096">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7097">quattro cifre generate in modo casuale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7097">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7098">Nuovo formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7098">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7099">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7099">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7100">Due cifre "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7100">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7101">9 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7101">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7102">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7102">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7103">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7103">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7104">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7104">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7105">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7105">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7106">La funzione  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o l'espressione regolare `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7106">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7107">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7107">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7108">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7108">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7109">La funzione  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` o l'espressione regolare `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7109">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7172">Numero di passaporto lettone</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7172">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7173">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7174">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7174">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7175">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7176">due lettere o cifre seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7176">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7177">due cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7177">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7178">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7178">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7179">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7180">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7180">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7181">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7182">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7182">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7183">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7183">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7184">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7184">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7185">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7185">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7186">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7187">L'espressione  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7187">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7188">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7188">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7211">Numero di patente di guida lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7211">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7212">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7213">otto cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7213">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7214">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7215">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7215">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7216">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7217">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7217">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7218">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7219">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7219">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7220">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7220">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7221">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7221">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7222">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7222">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7223">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7223">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7345">vairuotojo pažymėjimo numeriai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7345">vairuotojo pažymėjimo numeriai</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7346">Codice personale Lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7346">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7347">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7347">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7348">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7348">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7349">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7349">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7350">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7350">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7351">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7351">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7352">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7352">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7353">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7354">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7354">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7355">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7356">11 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7356">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7357">una cifra (da 1 a 6) che corrisponde al sesso e al secolo di nascita della persona</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7357">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7358">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7358">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7359">tre cifre che corrispondono al numero seriale della data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7359">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7360">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7360">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7361">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7362">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7362">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7363">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7364">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7365">La funzione  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7365">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7366">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7366">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7367">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7367">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7368">La funzione  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7368">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7403">Numero di passaporto lituania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7403">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7404">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7405">otto cifre o lettere senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7405">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7406">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7407">otto cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7407">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7408">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7409">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7409">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7410">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7411">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7412">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7412">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7413">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7414">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7415">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7416">L'espressione  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7416">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7417">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7437">Numero di patente di guida di Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7437">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7438">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7439">sei cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7439">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7440">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7441">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7441">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7442">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7443">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7443">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7444">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7445">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7446">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7446">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7447">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7447">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7569">fahrerlaubnis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7569">fahrerlaubnis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7570">Führerschäin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7570">Führerschäin</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7571">Numero di identificazione nazionale di Lussemburgo (persone fisiche)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7571">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7572">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7572">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7573">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7573">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7574">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7574">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7575">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7575">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7576">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7576">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7577">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7577">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7578">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7579">13 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7579">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7580">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7580">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7581">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7581">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7582">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7582">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7583">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7583">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7584">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7585">sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7585">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7586">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7587">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7587">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7588">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7588">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7589">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7589">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7590">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7590">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7591">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7591">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7614">Numero di passaporto di Luxemburg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7614">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7615">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7615">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7616">otto cifre o lettere senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7616">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7617">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7617">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7618">otto cifre o lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7618">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7619">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7620">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7620">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7621">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7622">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7622">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7623">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7623">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7624">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7624">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7625">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date3` regolare trova la data nel formato GG MM AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7625">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7626">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7626">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7627">L'espressione  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7627">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7628">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7628">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7660">Numero di identificazione nazionale di Luxemburg (persone non naturali)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7660">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7661">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7662">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7662">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7663">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7664">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7664">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7665">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7666">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7666">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7667">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7667">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7668">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7669">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7669">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7670">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7670">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7671">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7671">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7672">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7672">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7673">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7674">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7674">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7675">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7676">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7676">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7677">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7677">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7678">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7678">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7679">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7679">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7680">La funzione  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7680">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7720">Numero di carta di identità malese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7720">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7721">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7722">12 cifre contenenti lineette facoltative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7722">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7723">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7724">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7724">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7725">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7725">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7726">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7726">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7727">Codice luogo di nascita a due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7727">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7728">un trattino (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7728">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7729">tre cifre casuali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7729">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7730">codice di genere a una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7730">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7731">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7732">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7732">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7733">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7734">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7735">L'espressione regolare Regex_malaysia_id_card_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7735">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7736">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7736">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7763">Numero di patente di guida di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7763">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7764">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7765">Combinazione di due caratteri e sei cifre nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7765">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7766">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7767">combinazione di due caratteri e sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7767">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7768">due caratteri (cifre o lettere, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7768">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7769">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7769">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7770">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7770">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7771">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7771">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7772">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7772">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7773">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7774">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7774">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7775">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7776">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7777">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7777">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7778">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7778">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7902">Numero di carta d'identità di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7902">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7903">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7903">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7904">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7904">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7905">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7905">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7906">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7906">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7907">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7907">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7908">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7908">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7909">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7910">sette cifre seguite da una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7910">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7911">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7912">sette cifre seguite da una lettera:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7912">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7913">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7913">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7914">una lettera in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7914">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7915">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7916">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7916">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7917">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7918">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7918">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7919">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7919">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7920">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7920">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7921">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7921">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7922">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7922">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7939">Numero di passaporto di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7939">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7940">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7941">sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7941">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7942">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7943">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7943">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7944">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7945">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7945">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7946">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7947">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7948">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7948">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7949">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7949">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7950">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7950">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7951">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7951">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7952">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7952">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7953">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7953">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7973">Numero di identificazione fiscale di Malta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7973">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7974">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7975">Per i cittadini maltesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7975">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7976">sette cifre e una lettera nello schema specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7976">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7977">Nazionali non maltesi ed entità maltesi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7977">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7978">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7978">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7979">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7980">Nazionali maltesi: sette cifre e una lettera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7980">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7981">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7981">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7982">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7982">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7983">Nazionali non maltesi ed entità maltesi: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7983">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7984">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7984">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7985">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7985">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7986">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7986">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7987">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7987">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7988">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7988">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7989">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  regolare o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7989">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7990">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7990">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7991">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7991">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-7992">L'espressione  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` regolare o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-7992">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8002">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8002">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8003">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8003">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8007">identificazione fiscale no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8007">tax identification no</span></span>

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8025">Carta MBI (Medicare Beneficiary Identifier)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8025">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8026">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8027">Motivo alfanumerico a 11 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8027">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8028">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8028">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8029">una cifra compresa tra 1 e 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8029">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8030">una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8030">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8031">una cifra o una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8031">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8032">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8032">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8033">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8033">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8034">una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8034">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8035">una cifra o una lettera esclusa S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8035">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8036">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8036">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8037">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8037">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8038">due lettere escluse S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8038">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8039">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8039">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8040">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8040">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8041">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8041">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8042">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8042">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8043">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8043">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8044">L'espressione  `Regex_mbi_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8044">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8045">Viene trovata una parola  `Keyword_mbi_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8045">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8046">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8046">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8047">L'espressione  `Regex_mbi_card` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8047">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8048">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8048">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8049">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8049">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8050">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8050">mbi</span></span>

## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8057">Codice CURP (Unique Population Registry Code) del Messico</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8057">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8058">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8059">Motivo alfanumerico a 18 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8059">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8060">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8060">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8061">quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8061">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8062">sei cifre che indicano una data valida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8062">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8063">una lettera - H/h o M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8063">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8064">due lettere che indicano un codice di stato messicano valido</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8064">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8065">tre lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8065">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8066">una lettera o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8066">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8067">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8067">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8068">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8069">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8069">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8070">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8071">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8072">La funzione  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8072">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8073">Viene trovata una parola  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8073">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8074">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8074">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8075">La funzione  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8075">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
