## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8096">Numero BSN (Netherlands citizen's service)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8096">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8097">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8098">otto o nove cifre contenenti spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8098">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8099">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8100">otto-nove cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8100">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8101">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8101">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8102">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8102">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8103">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8103">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8104">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8104">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8105">due-tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8105">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8106">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8107">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8107">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8108">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8109">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8110">La funzione Func_netherlands_bsn trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8110">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8111">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_netherlands_bsn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8111">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8112">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8112">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8136">Numero di patente olandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8136">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8137">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8138">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8138">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8139">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8140">10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8140">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8141">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8142">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8142">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8143">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8144">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8144">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8145">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8145">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8146">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8146">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8274">Numero di passaporto olandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8274">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8275">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8276">nove lettere o cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8276">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8277">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8278">nove lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8278">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8279">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8280">non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8280">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8281">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8282">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8282">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8283">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8283">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8284">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8284">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8285">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AAAA (esempio - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8285">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8286">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8286">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8287">L'espressione  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8287">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8288">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8288">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8307">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8307">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8308">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8308">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8309">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8309">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8310">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8310">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8311">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8311">records management</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8313">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8313">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8315">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8316">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8316">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8317">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8318">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8318">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8319">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8320">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8320">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8321">La funzione  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8321">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8322">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8322">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8323">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8323">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8324">La funzione  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8324">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8362">Numero di imposta sul valore aggiunto dei Paesi Bassi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8362">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8363">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8363">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8364">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8364">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8365">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8365">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8366">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8366">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8367">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8367">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8368">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8368">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8369">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8370">Motivo alfanumerico a 14 caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8370">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8371">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8372">Motivo alfanumerico a 14 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8372">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8373">N o n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8373">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8374">L o l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8374">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8375">spazio facoltativo, punto o trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8375">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8376">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8376">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8377">spazio facoltativo, punto o trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8377">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8378">B o b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8378">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8379">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8379">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8380">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8381">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8381">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8382">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8383">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8384">La funzione Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8384">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8385">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8385">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8386">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8386">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8387">La funzione Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8387">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8405">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8406">Motivo da 14 a 16 cifre con delimitatore facoltativo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8406">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8407">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8407">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8408">un trattino o uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8408">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8409">da tre a quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8409">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8410">un trattino o uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8410">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8411">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8411">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8412">un trattino o uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8412">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8413">da due a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8413">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8414">un trattino o uno spazio delle opzioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8414">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8415">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8416">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8416">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8417">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8418">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8418">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8419">La funzione Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8419">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8420">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8420">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8421">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8421">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8422">La funzione Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8422">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8438">schema alfanumerico a otto caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8438">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8439">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8440">schema alfanumerico a otto caratteri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8440">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8443">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8444">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8445">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8446">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8446">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8447">La funzione Func_newzealand_driver_license_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8447">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8448">Viene trovata una parola Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8448">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8449">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8449">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8450">La funzione Func_newzealand_driver_license_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8450">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8525">otto o nove cifre con delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8525">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8526">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8527">otto o nove cifre con delimitatori facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8527">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8528">due o tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8528">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8529">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8529">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8530">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8531">uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8531">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8532">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8532">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8533">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8533">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8534">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8534">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8535">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8535">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8536">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8536">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8537">La funzione Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8537">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8538">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8538">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8539">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8540">La funzione Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8540">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8549">Numero del ministero della sanità della Nuova Zelanda</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8549">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8550">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8551">tre lettere, uno spazio (facoltativo) e quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8551">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8552">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8552">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8553">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) tranne "I" e "O"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8553">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8554">uno spazio (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8554">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8555">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8555">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8556">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8557">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8557">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8558">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8559">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8559">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8560">La funzione Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8560">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8561">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_nz_terms.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8561">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8562">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8562">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8563">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8563">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8564">La funzione Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8564">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8565">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8565">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8579">Numero di previdenza sociale neozelandese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8579">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8580">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8580">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8581">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8581">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8582">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8582">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8583">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8583">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8584">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8584">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8585">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8585">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8586">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8587">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8588">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8589">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8589">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8590">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8590">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8591">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8591">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8592">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8592">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8593">un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8593">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8594">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8594">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8595">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8596">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8596">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8597">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8598">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8598">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8599">La funzione Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8599">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8600">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8600">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8601">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8601">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8602">La funzione Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8602">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8610">Numero di identificazione norvegia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8610">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8611">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8612">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8612">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8613">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8614">11 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8614">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8615">sei cifre nel formato DDMMYY, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8615">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8616">numero individuale a tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8616">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8617">due cifre di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8617">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8618">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8619">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8619">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8620">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8621">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8621">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8622">La funzione Func_norway_id_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8622">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8623">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_norway_id_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8623">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8624">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8624">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8625">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8625">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8626">La funzione Func_norway_id_numbe trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8626">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8627">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8627">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8636">Numero di identificazione multivalore unificato delle Filippine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8636">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8637">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8637">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8638">12 cifre separate da dei segni meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8638">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8639">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8639">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8640">12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8640">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8641">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8641">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8642">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8642">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8643">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8643">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8644">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8644">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8645">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8645">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8646">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8647">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8648">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8649">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8650">L'espressione regolare Regex_philippines_unified_id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8650">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8651">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_philippines_id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8651">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8653">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8653">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8656">Carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8656">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8657">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8657">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8658">Numero di patente di guida polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8658">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8659">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8660">14 cifre contenenti due barre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8660">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8661">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8662">14 cifre e due barre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8662">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8663">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8663">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8664">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8664">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8665">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8666">una barra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8666">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8667">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8667">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8668">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8669">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8669">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8670">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8671">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8671">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8672">L'espressione  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8672">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8673">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8797">Carta di identità polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8797">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8798">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8799">tre lettere e sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8799">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8800">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8801">tre lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8801">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8802">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8803">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8803">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8804">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8805">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8805">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8806">La funzione Func_polish_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8806">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8807">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8807">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8808">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8809">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8809">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8813">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8813">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8815">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8815">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8816">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8816">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8819">ID nazionale Polonia (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8819">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8820">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8821">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8821">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8822">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8822">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8823">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita nel formato AAMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8823">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8824">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8824">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8825">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8825">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8826">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8826">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8827">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8827">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8828">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8828">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8829">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8829">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8830">La funzione Func_pesel_identification_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8830">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8831">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_pesel_identification_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8831">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8832">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8832">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8833">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8833">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8834">La funzione Func_pesel_identification_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8834">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8835">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8836">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8836">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8847">Numero di passaporto polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8847">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8848">Questa entità tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate Numero di passaporto UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8848">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8849">È disponibile anche come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8849">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8850">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8850">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8851">due lettere e sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8851">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8852">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8852">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8853">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8853">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8854">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8855">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8855">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8856">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8857">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8857">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8858">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8858">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8859">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8859">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8860">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8860">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8861">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8861">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8862">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8862">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8863">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8863">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8864">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8864">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8865">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8865">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8866">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8866">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8867">La funzione `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8867">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8868">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8894">Numero REGON Polonia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8894">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8895">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8895">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8896">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8896">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8897">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8897">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8898">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8898">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8899">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8899">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8900">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8900">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8904">numero a nove cifre o a 14 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8904">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8905">nove cifre o</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8905">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8906">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8906">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8909">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8910">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8910">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8911">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8912">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8912">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8913">La funzione Func_polish_regon_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8913">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8914">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_polish_regon_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8914">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8915">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8915">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8916">La funzione Func_polish_regon_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8916">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8944">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8947">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8983">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8983">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8985">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8985">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8986">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8987">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8987">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8988">L'espressione regolare Regex_portugal_citizen_card trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8988">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-8989">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_portugal_citizen_card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-8989">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9009">Numero di patente di guida portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9009">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9010">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9011">due modelli - due lettere seguite da 5-8 cifre con caratteri speciali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9011">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9012">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9013">Modello 1: due lettere seguite da 5/6 con caratteri speciali:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9013">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9014">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9014">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9015">Una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9015">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9016">Cinque o sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9016">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9017">Uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9017">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9018">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9018">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9019">Modello 2: una lettera seguita da 6/8 cifre con caratteri speciali:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9019">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9020">Una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9020">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9021">Una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9021">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9022">Sei o otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9022">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9023">Uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9023">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9024">Una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9024">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9025">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9026">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9026">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9027">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9028">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9028">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9029">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9029">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9030">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9030">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
