## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9162">Numero di passaporto portoghese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9162">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9163">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9164">una lettera seguita da sei cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9164">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9165">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9166">una lettera seguita da sei cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9166">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9167">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9167">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9168">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9168">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9169">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9170">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9171">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9172">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9173">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9173">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9174">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9175">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9175">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9176">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9177">L'espressione  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9177">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9178">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9205">Numero di identificazione fiscale del Portogallo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9205">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9206">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9207">nove cifre con spazi facoltativi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9207">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9208">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9208">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9209">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9209">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9210">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9210">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9211">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9211">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9212">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9212">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9213">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9213">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9214">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9215">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9215">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9216">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9217">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9217">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9218">La funzione  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9218">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9219">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9219">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9220">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9220">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9221">La funzione  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9221">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9246">Numero di patente di guida romania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9246">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9247">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9247">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9248">un carattere seguito da otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9248">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9249">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9249">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9250">un carattere seguito da otto cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9250">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9251">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9251">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9252">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9252">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9253">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9254">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9254">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9255">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9256">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9256">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9257">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9257">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9258">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9258">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9386">Codice numerico personale Romania (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9386">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9387">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9388">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9389">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9390">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9391">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9392">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9393">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9394">13 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9394">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9395">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9395">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9396">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9396">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9397">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9397">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9398">due cifre, che possono essere 01-52 o 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9398">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9399">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9399">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9400">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9401">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9401">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9402">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9403">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9403">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9404">La funzione  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9404">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9405">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9405">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9406">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9406">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9407">La funzione  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9407">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9458">Numero di passaporto romania</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9458">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9459">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9460">otto o nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9460">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9461">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9462">otto o nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9462">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9463">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9464">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9464">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9465">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9466">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9466">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9467">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9467">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9468">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9468">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9469">L'espressione regolare trova la data nel formato `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (esempio- 01 FEB/FEB 10) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9469">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9470">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9470">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9471">L'espressione  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9471">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9472">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9472">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">

          <Any minMatches="1">

          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9582">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9582">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9583">nove lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9583">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9584">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9584">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9585">nove lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9585">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9586">la lettera "F", "G", "S" o "T" (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9586">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9587">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9587">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9588">una cifra di controllo alfabetica</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9588">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9589">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9589">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9590">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9590">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9591">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9591">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9592">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9592">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9593">L'espressione regolare Regex_singapore_nric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9593">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9594">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_singapore_nric.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9594">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9595">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9595">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9596">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9596">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9597">L'espressione regolare Regex_singapore_nric trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9597">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9598">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9598">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9602">Numero di carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9602">Identity Card Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9603">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9603">NRIC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9604">IC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9604">IC</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9609">Numero di patente di guida slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9609">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9610">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9611">un carattere seguito da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9611">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9612">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9613">un carattere seguito da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9613">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9614">una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9614">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9615">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9615">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9616">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9617">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9617">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9618">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9619">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9620">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9620">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9621">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9621">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9747">Numero personale Slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9747">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9748">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9748">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9749">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9749">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9750">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9750">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9751">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9751">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9752">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9752">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9753">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9753">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9754">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9755">nove o 10 cifre contenenti barra rovesciata facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9755">nine or 10 digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9756">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9756">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9757">sei cifre che rappresentano la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9757">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9758">barra facoltativa (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9758">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9759">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9759">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9760">una cifra di controllo facoltativa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9760">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9761">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9762">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9762">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9763">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9764">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9765">La funzione  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9765">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9766">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9766">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9767">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9767">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9768">La funzione  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9768">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9815">Numero di passaporto slovacchia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9815">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9816">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9817">una cifra o una lettera seguita da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9817">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9818">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9819">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguita da sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9819">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9820">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9821">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9821">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9822">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9823">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9823">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9824">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9824">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9825">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9825">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9826">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9826">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9827">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9828">L'espressione  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9828">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9829">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9829">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9851">Numero di patente di guida slovena</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9851">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9852">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9853">nove cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9853">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9854">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9855">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9855">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9856">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9857">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9857">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9858">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9859">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9859">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9860">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9860">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9861">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9861">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9988">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9988">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9989">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9989">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9990">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9990">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9991">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9991">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9992">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9992">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9993">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9993">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9994">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9994">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9995">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9996">13 cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9996">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9997">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9998">13 cifre nel modello specificato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9998">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-9999">sette cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (DDMMLLL), dove "LLL" corrisponde alle ultime tre cifre dell'anno di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-9999">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10000">due cifre che corrispondono all'area di nascita "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10000">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10001">tre cifre che corrispondono a una combinazione di sesso e numero di serie per le persone nate nello stesso giorno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10001">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10002">000-499 per gli uomini e 500-999 per le femmine.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10002">000-499 for male and 500-999 for female.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10003">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10003">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10004">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10005">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10005">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10006">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10007">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10007">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10008">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10008">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10009">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10009">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10010">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10010">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10011">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10011">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10039">Numero di passaporto slovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10039">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10040">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10040">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10041">due lettere seguite da sette cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10041">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10042">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10042">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10043">due lettere seguite da sette cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10043">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10044">la lettera "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10044">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10045">una lettera maiuscola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10045">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10046">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10046">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10047">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10048">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10048">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10049">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10050">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10051">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10051">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10052">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10052">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10053">L'espressione `Regex_eu_passport_date1` regolare trova la data nel formato GG.MM.AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10053">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10054">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10055">L'espressione  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10055">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10056">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10079">Numero di identificazione fiscale Slovenia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10079">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10080">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10080">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10081">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10081">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10082">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10082">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10083">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10083">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10084">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10084">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10085">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10085">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10086">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10087">otto cifre senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10087">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10088">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10088">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10089">una cifra da 1 a 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10089">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10090">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10090">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10091">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10091">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10092">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10093">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10093">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10094">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10095">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10095">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10096">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10096">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10097">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10097">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10098">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10098">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10099">La funzione  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10099">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10123">Numero di identificazione sudafricano</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10123">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10124">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10125">13 cifre che possono contenere spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10125">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10126">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10127">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10127">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10128">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10128">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10129">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10129">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10130">indicatore di cittadinanza a una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10130">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10131">la cifra "8" o "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10131">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10132">una cifra, ovvero una cifra di checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10132">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10133">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10134">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10134">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10135">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10136">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10136">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10137">La funzione Func_south_africa_identification_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10137">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10138">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_south_africa_identification_number da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10138">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10139">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10145">South Korea resident registration number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10145">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10146">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10147">13 cifre contenenti un segno meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10147">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10148">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10148">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10149">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10149">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10150">sei cifre nel formato AAMMDD, ovvero la data di nascita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10150">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10151">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10151">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10152">una cifra determinata dal secolo e dal sesso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10152">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10153">Codice paese di nascita a quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10153">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10154">una cifra utilizzata per distinguere le persone per le quali i numeri precedenti sono identici</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10154">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10155">una cifra di controllo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10155">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10156">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10157">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10157">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10158">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10159">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10159">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10160">La funzione Func_south_korea_resident_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10160">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10161">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keyword_south_korea_resident_number'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10161">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10162">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10162">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10163">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10163">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10164">La funzione Func_south_korea_resident_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10164">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10165">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10165">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10166">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10166">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10167">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10167">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10168">Carta di identità</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10168">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10169">Numero di registrazione del cittadino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10169">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10170">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10170">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10171">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10171">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10172">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10172">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10173">Numero di patente di guida in Spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10173">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10174">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10175">otto cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10175">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10176">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10177">otto cifre seguite da un carattere:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10177">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10178">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10178">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10179">una cifra o una lettera (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10179">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10180">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10181">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10181">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10182">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10183">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10184">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10184">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10185">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10185">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10186">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10187">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10187">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10321">Spagna DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10321">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10322">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10322">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10323">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10323">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10324">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10324">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10325">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10325">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10326">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10326">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10327">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10327">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10328">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10329">otto cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10329">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10330">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10331">sette cifre seguite da un carattere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10331">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10332">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10332">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10333">Uno spazio o un trattino facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10333">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10334">una lettera di controllo (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10334">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10335">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10336">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10336">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10337">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10338">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10338">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10339">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10339">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10340">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10340">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10341">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10341">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10342">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10342">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
