## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10366">Numero di passaporto spagnolo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10366">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10367">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10368">una combinazione di otto o nove caratteri di lettere e numeri senza spazi o delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10368">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10369">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10370">una combinazione di otto o nove caratteri di lettere e numeri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10370">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10371">due cifre o lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10371">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10372">una cifra o una lettera (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10372">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10373">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10373">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10374">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10375">Non applicabile</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10375">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10376">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10377">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10377">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10378">L'espressione  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10378">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10379">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10379">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10380">L'espressione `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` regolare trova la data nel formato GG-MM-AAAA o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10380">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10381">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10381">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10382">L'espressione  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10382">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10383">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10383">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10396">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10396">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10397">libreta pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10397">libreta pasaporte</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10412">Spagna - Numero di previdenza sociale (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10412">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10413">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10414">11-12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10414">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10415">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10416">11-12 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10416">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10417">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10417">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10418">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10418">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10419">da sette a otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10419">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10420">una barra (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10420">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10421">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10421">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10422">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10423">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10423">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10424">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10425">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10425">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10426">La funzione Func_spanish_social_security_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10426">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10427">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10427">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10428">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10428">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10429">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10430">La funzione Func_spanish_social_security_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10430">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10431">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10431">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10440">Numero di identificazione fiscale spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10440">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10441">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10441">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10442">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10442">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10443">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10443">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10444">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10444">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10445">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10445">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10446">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10446">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10447">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10448">sette o otto cifre e una o due lettere nel modello specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10448">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10449">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10450">Spagnolo Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10450">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10451">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10451">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10452">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10452">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10453">Spagnoli non residenti senza carta di identità nazionale di Spagna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10453">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10454">una lettera maiuscola "L" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10454">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10455">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10455">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10456">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10456">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10457">Spagnoli residenti di età inferiore a 14 anni senza carta d'identità nazionale spagna:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10457">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10458">una lettera maiuscola "K" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10458">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10459">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10459">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10460">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10460">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10461">Stranieri con numero di identificazione di uno straniero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10462">una lettera maiuscola che è "X", "Y" o "Z" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10462">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10463">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10463">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10464">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10464">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10465">Stranieri senza numero di identificazione di uno straniero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10466">una lettera maiuscola che è "M" (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10466">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10467">sette cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10467">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10468">una lettera maiuscola (maiuscole/minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10468">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10469">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10470">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10470">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10471">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10472">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10472">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10473">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10473">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10474">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10474">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10475">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10476">La funzione  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` o trova contenuto che corrisponde al `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10476">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10507">SQL Server stringa di connessione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10507">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10508">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10509">La stringa "User Id", "User ID", "uid" o "UserId" seguita dai caratteri e dalle stringhe descritti nel modello seguente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10509">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10510">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10510">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10511">la stringa "User Id", "User ID", "uid" o "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10511">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10512">qualsiasi combinazione di 1-200 lettere minuscole o maiuscole, cifre, simboli, caratteri speciali o spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10512">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10513">la stringa "Password" o "pwd" dove "pwd" non è preceduta da una lettera minuscola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10513">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10514">un segno di uguale (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10514">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10515">qualsiasi carattere che non sia un simbolo del dollaro ($), un simbolo di percentuale (%), un simbolo di maggiore di (>), un simbolo di simbolo (@), virgolette ("), un punto e virgola (;), una parentesi graffa sinistra([) o una parentesi quadra sinistra ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10515">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10516">qualsiasi combinazione di 7-128 caratteri che non siano un punto e virgola (;), barra (/) o virgolette (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10516">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10517">un punto e virgola (;) o virgolette (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10517">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10518">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10518">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10519">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10519">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10520">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10520">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10521">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10521">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10522">L'espressione regolare CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10522">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10523">Una parola chiave CEP_GlobalFilter non viene trovata.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10523">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10524">L'espressione CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10524">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10525">L'espressione CEP_CommonExampleKeywords non trova contenuto corrispondente al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10525">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10539">Simbolo maggiore di (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10539">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10553">Numero di patente di guida in Svezia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10553">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10554">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10555">10 cifre contenenti una lineetta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10555">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10556">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10557">10 cifre contenenti un trattino:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10557">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10558">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10558">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10559">un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10559">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10560">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10560">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10561">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10562">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10563">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10564">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10565">L'espressione  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` regolare trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10565">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10566">Viene trovata una  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10699">Svezia - ID nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10699">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10700">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10701">10 o 12 cifre e un delimitatore facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10701">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10702">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10703">10 o 12 cifre e un delimitatore facoltativo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10703">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10704">due cifre (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10704">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10705">Sei cifre nel formato data AAMMGG</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10705">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10706">delimitatore di "-" o "+" (facoltativo)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10706">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10707">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10707">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10708">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10709">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10710">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10711">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10712">La funzione `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10712">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10713">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10713">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10714">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10715">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10716">La funzione `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10716">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10717">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10717">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10736">Svezia - numero di passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10736">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10737">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10738">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10738">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10739">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10740">otto cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10740">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10741">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10742">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10742">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10743">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10744">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10744">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10745">l'espressione regolare Regex_sweden_passport_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10745">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10746">viene trovata `Keywords_eu_passport_number` una parola chiave da o `Keyword_sweden_passport` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10746">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10747">l'espressione regolare trova una data nel formato `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM AA (01 JAN/JAN 12) o viene trovata una parola chiave `Keywords_eu_passport_date` da.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10747">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10748">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10749">l'espressione regolare Regex_sweden_passport_number trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10749">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10750">viene trovata `Keywords_eu_passport_number` una parola chiave da o `Keyword_sweden_passport` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10750">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10786">Numero di identificazione fiscale svezia</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10786">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10787">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10787">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10788">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10788">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10789">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10789">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10790">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10790">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10791">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10791">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10792">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10792">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10793">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10794">10 cifre e un simbolo nel motivo specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10794">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10795">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10796">10 cifre e un simbolo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10796">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10797">sei cifre che corrispondono alla data di nascita (AAMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10797">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10798">segno più o meno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10798">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10799">tre cifre che rendono univoco il numero di identificazione dove:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10799">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10800">per i numeri emessi prima del 1990, la settima e l'ottava cifra identificano la provincia di nascita o i nati all'estero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10800">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10801">la cifra nella nona posizione indica il sesso per dispari per il maschio o anche per la donna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10801">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10802">una cifra di controllo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10802">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10803">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10804">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10804">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10805">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10806">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10807">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10807">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10808">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10808">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10809">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10810">La funzione  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10810">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10836">Codice SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10836">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10837">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10838">quattro lettere seguite da 5-31 lettere o cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10838">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10839">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10840">quattro lettere seguite da 5-31 lettere o cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10840">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10841">Codice bancario di quattro lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10841">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10842">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10842">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10843">4-28 lettere o cifre (BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10843">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10844">uno spazio facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10844">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10845">da una a tre lettere o cifre (resto del BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10845">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10846">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10847">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10848">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10849">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10850">L'espressione regolare Regex_swift restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10850">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10851">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_swift.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10851">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10852">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10852">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10888">Svizzera - Numero AVS SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10888">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10889">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10889">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10890">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10890">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10891">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10891">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10892">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10892">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10893">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10893">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10894">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10894">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10895">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10896">Numero a 13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10896">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10897">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10898">Numero a 13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10898">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10899">tre cifre - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10899">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10900">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10900">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10901">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10901">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10902">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10902">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10903">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10903">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10904">un punto facoltativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10904">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10905">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10905">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10906">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10907">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10907">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10908">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10909">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10909">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10910">La funzione Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10910">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10911">Viene trovata una parola chiave Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv'utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10911">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10912">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10913">La funzione Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10913">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10934">Taiwan - Numero di identificazione nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10934">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10935">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10936">una lettera (in inglese) seguita da nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10936">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10937">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10938">una lettera (in inglese) seguita da nove cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10938">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10939">una lettera (in inglese, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10939">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10940">la cifra "1" o "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10940">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10941">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10941">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10942">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10943">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10943">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10944">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10945">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10946">La funzione Func_taiwanese_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10946">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10947">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_taiwanese_national_id.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10947">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10948">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10949">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10950">La funzione Func_taiwanese_national_id restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10950">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10951">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10968">Numero di passaporto taiwanese</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10968">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10969">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10969">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10970">Numero di passaporto biometrico: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10970">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10971">numero di passaporto non biometrico: nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10971">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10972">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10972">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10973">numero di passaporto biometrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10973">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10974">il carattere "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10974">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10975">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10975">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10976">numero di passaporto non biometrico:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10976">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10977">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10977">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10978">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10979">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10979">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10980">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10981">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10982">L'espressione regolare Regex_taiwan_passport trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10982">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10983">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_taiwan_passport da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10983">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10994">Numero di certificato residente a Taiwan (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10994">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10995">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10996">10 lettere e cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10996">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10997">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10998">10 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10998">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-10999">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-10999">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11000">otto cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11000">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11001">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11002">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11002">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11003">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11004">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11005">L'espressione regolare Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11005">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11006">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11006">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11020">Codice di identificazione della popolazione thai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11020">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11021">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11022">13 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11022">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11023">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11024">13 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11024">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11025">la prima cifra non è zero o nove</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11025">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11026">12 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11026">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11027">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11028">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11028">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11029">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11030">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11030">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11031">La funzione Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11031">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11032">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11032">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11033">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11033">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11034">La funzione Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11034">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11039">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11039">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11040">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11040">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11041">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11041">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11043">Numero di identificazione nazionale turco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11043">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11044">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11045">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11045">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11046">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11047">11 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11047">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11048">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11048">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11049">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11049">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11050">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11050">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11051">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11051">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11052">La funzione Func_Turkish_National_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11052">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11053">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Turkish_National_Id da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11053">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11054">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11055">La funzione Func_Turkish_National_Id trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11055">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11056">Parole chiave</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11056">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11062">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11062">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11063">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11063">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11064">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11065">Combinazione di 18 lettere e numeri nel formato specificato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11065">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11066">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11067">18 lettere e cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11067">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11068">Cinque lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o la cifra "9" al posto di una lettera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11068">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11069">Una cifra.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11069">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11070">Cinque cifre nel formato di data MMDDY per la data di nascita.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11070">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11071">Il settimo carattere viene incrementato di 50 se driver è femminile. per exampe, da 51 a 62 invece che da 01 a 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11071">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11072">Due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) o la cifra "9" al posto di una lettera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11072">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11073">Cinque cifre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11073">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11074">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11075">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11076">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11077">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11077">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11078">La funzione `Func_uk_drivers_license` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11078">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11079">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11079">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11080">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11080">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11081">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11081">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11082">La funzione `Func_uk_drivers_license` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11082">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11083">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11083">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11204">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11204">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11205">numero di rullino elettorale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11205">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11206">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11207">due lettere seguite da 1-4 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11207">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11208">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11209">due lettere (senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole) seguite da 1-4 numeri</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11209">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11210">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11210">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11211">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11211">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11212">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11212">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11213">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11214">L'espressione regolare Regex_uk_electoral restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11214">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11215">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_electoral.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11215">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
