#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11218">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11218">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11219">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11219">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11220">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11220">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11221">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11221">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11222">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11222">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11223">numero del servizio sanitario nazionale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11223">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11224">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11225">10-17 cifre separate da spazi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11225">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11226">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11227">10-17 cifre:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11227">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11228">3 o 10 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11228">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11229">uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11229">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11230">tre cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11230">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11231">uno spazio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11231">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11232">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11232">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11233">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11234">Sì</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11235">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11236">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11237">La funzione Func_uk_nhs_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11237">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11238">Si verifica una delle situazioni seguenti:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11239">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11239">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11240">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11240">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11241">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11241">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11242">Il checksum ha esito positivo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11260">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11260">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11262">Questa entità del tipo di informazioni riservate è inclusa nel tipo di informazioni riservate NUMERO DI IDENTIFICAZIONE NAZIONALE UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11262">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11263">È disponibile anche come entità di tipo di informazioni riservate autonomo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11263">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11264">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11265">sette o nove caratteri separati da spazi o trattini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11265">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11266">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11267">due modelli possibili:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11267">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11268">due lettere (i VALORI NINO validi utilizzano solo determinati caratteri in questo prefisso, convalidato da questo modello, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11268">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11269">sei cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11269">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11270">'A', 'B', 'C' o 'D' (come il prefisso, nel suffisso sono consentiti solo determinati caratteri, senza distinzione tra maiuscole e minuscole)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11270">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11271">OPPURE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11272">due lettere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11272">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11273">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11273">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11274">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11274">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11275">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11275">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11276">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11276">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11277">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11277">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11278">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11278">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11279">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11279">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11280">"A", "B", "C" o "D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11280">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11281">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11282">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11282">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11283">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11284">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11284">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11285">La funzione Func_uk_nino restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11285">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11286">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_uk_nino.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11286">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11287">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11287">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11288">La funzione Func_uk_nino restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11288">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11310">Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11310">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11311">Numero di riferimento fiscale univoco</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11311">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11312">Questo tipo di informazioni riservate è disponibile solo per l'utilizzo in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11312">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11313">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11313">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11314">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11314">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11315">governance delle informazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11315">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11316">gestione dei record</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11316">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11317">Sicurezza delle app cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11317">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11318">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11319">10 cifre senza spazi e delimitatori</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11319">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11320">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11323">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11323">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11324">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11325">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11326">La funzione  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11326">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11327">Viene trovata una parola  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` chiave from.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11327">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml

      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11348">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11348">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11349">6-17 cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11349">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11350">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11350">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11351">6-17 cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11351">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11352">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11353">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11354">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11355">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11356">L'espressione regolare Regex_usa_bank_account_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11356">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11357">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_usa_Bank_Account.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11357">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11387">Numero di patente di guida statunitense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11387">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11388">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11389">Varia in base allo stato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11389">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11390">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11391">dipende dallo stato, ad esempio New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11391">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11392">le nove cifre formattate come ddd ddd ddd corrisponderanno.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11392">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11393">nove cifre come dddddddddd non corrispondono.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11393">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11394">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11395">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11396">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11397">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11398">La funzione Func_new_york_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11398">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11399">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11399">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11400">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11400">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11401">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11401">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11402">La funzione Func_new_york_drivers_license_number restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11402">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11403">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11403">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11404">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11404">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11405">Non vengono trovate parole chiave da Keyword_us_drivers_license.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11405">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11503">Numero di identificazione del singolo contribuente statunitense (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11503">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11504">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11505">nove cifre che iniziano con "9" e contengono "7" o "8" come quarta cifra, facoltativamente formattate con spazi o trattini</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11505">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11506">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11507">formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11507">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11508">la cifra "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11508">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11509">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11509">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11510">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11510">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11511">a "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11511">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11512">una cifra</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11512">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11513">uno spazio o un trattino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11513">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11514">quattro cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11514">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11515">non formattato:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11515">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11516">la cifra "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11516">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11517">due cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11517">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11518">a "7" o "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11518">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11519">cinque cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11519">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11520">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11521">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11522">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11523">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11523">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11524">La funzione Func_formatted_itin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11524">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11525">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11525">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11526">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11527">La funzione Func_unformatted_itin restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11527">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11528">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_itin.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11528">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11529">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11530">La funzione Func_formatted_itin o Func_unformatted_itin trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11530">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11545">Numero di previdenza sociale statunitense (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11545">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11546">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11546">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11547">nove cifre, che possono essere formattate o non formattate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11547">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11548">Se emesso prima della metà del 2011, un SSN ha una formattazione solida in cui alcune parti del numero devono rientrare in determinati intervalli per essere valide (ma non è presente alcun checksum).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11548">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11549">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11549">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11550">Quattro funzioni ricercano i nomi SSN in quattro modelli diversi:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11550">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11551">Func_ssn trova SSN con formattazione forte precedente alla 2011 formattata con trattini o spazi (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11551">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn trova SSN con formattazione forte precedente alla versione 2011 non formattata come nove cifre consecutive (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn trova sSN post-2011 formattati con trattini o spazi (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn trova SSN post-2011 non formattati come nove cifre consecutive (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11555">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11556">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11556">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11557">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11558">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11558">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11559">La funzione Func_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11559">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11560">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11560">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11561">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11562">La funzione Func_unformatted_ssn trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11562">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11563">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11563">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11564">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11564">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11565">La funzione Func_randomized_formatted_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11565">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11566">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11566">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11567">Un criterio DLP ha una bassa probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11567">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11568">La funzione Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11568">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11569">Viene trovata una parola chiave da Keyword_ssn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11569">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11584">Stati Uniti / Regno Unito</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11584">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11585">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11585">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11586">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11587">nove cifre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11588">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11589">nove cifre consecutive</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11589">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11590">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11591">No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11591">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11592">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11593">Un criterio DLP ha un'elevata probabilità che sia stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11593">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11594">La funzione Func_usa_uk_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11594">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11595">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11595">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11596">Viene trovata una parola `Keywords_eu_passport_date` chiave da</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11596">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11597">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11597">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11598">La funzione Func_usa_uk_passport restituisce contenuti che corrispondono al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11598">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11599">Viene trovata una `Keywords_eu_passport_number` parola chiave da o `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11599">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11629">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11629">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11631">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic da un utente.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11631">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11642">criteri di prevenzione della perdita di dati</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11642">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11643">criteri di conformità delle comunicazioni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11643">communication compliance policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11647">Formato</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11647">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11649">Criterio</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11650">Schema alfanumerico a otto caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11650">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11653">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11653">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11655">Definizione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11655">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11656">Un criterio DLP ha una probabilità media di essere stato rilevato questo tipo di informazioni riservate se, entro una prossimità di 300 caratteri:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11656">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11657">L'espressione Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International trova contenuto che corrisponde al modello.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11657">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="23fd4-11658">Viene trovata una parola Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International parola chiave.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="23fd4-11658">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
